short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clean your feed by removing annoying feed items

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
While indefinitely scrolling through your Facebook feeds, If you have ever came across posts which made you think : Why am I seeing this ?, then this is the plugin for you to clean up your feed. 
You see posts like
* Your friend liked her friend's post
* Your friend likes some sponsored page
* Sponsored posts
* Video you may like
And you don't want those to appear in your feed, but there are no settings that Facebook has provided to opt out of such posts, and they will never.
Then there comes this small plugin which when enabled removes such annoying posts from your feed leaving behind posts which are more important to you.
When feeling lazy, when you don't care what you are scrolling through, you can disable this clean up with single click and enable it back whenever you want.

Code : https://github.com/injulkarnilesh/zenfeed
